name: NBA Baller Beats
description: The Games on Demand version supports English and does not include a basketball..  Download the manual for this game by locating the game on http://marketplace.xbox.com and selecting “See Game Manual".  This game requires a Kinect™ Sensor.  NBA Baller Beats is the first ever motion-based sports video game that requires you to actively play using a real basketball.  The music is your guide as you aspire to perform like a pro and practice your ball-handling skills while building stamina you’ll need for the court – all while having the fun of playing a video game.
